name: Tribal Run
description:
A simple endless runner game where Lucy needs to collect fruits to help feed her tribe. Done for game physics course by VIT Bhopal. 

Use A and D to move and space bar to jump

Full project files are available on github: https://github.com/kvvin/Tribal-Run-game-physics-project.git

The game is still in development hence there may be some bugs.

Group Members: Kevin Thomas, Harish Sivakumar, Bennet Krubakkar, Adhyan Tiwari
